long_description: Rely on the expert fit, ultra-lightweight performance fabric and chafe-free, built-in briefs of the Patagonia Strider shorts to enhance your comfort during your runs. Quick-drying, stretchy fabric provides air circulation and moisture management; fabric is partially recycled. Fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off, and breathable mesh panels to enhance ventilation. Moisture-wicking, quick drying liner briefs offer a comfortable fit without being too tight. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes fit. Internal envelope pocket stores a key or card. Reflective logo improves visibility. Patagonia Strider shorts offer a regular fit that won't bind or chafe.
short_description: Rely on the expert fit, ultra-lightweight performance fabric and chafe-free, built-in briefs of the Patagonia Strider shorts to enhance your comfort during your runs.
